name: Shlok
description:
I wrote the necessary information about the game in the text document named "readme" in the RAR file. By the way, I want to say again what is the alpha version of this game. Unstable AI may be buttons that don't work. I didn't even add sound to the game. If there is even a small interest, I will develop a masterful game.

Don't forget! Have lots of fun :)
